message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an introductory price of $95. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it carefully.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me in the middle at $82.50?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In order to accommodate your budget while still providing you with the best value, I would like to offer the product for $85. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82?
